TopicTitle: (Beta) Sonic Hero's Egg Fleet Ship replica

Articles.Content:
So I busted out my old ps2 the other day and decided to play Sonic Hero's. I made to the Egg Fleet and then it hit me, The ships are so kerbal. So I took the liberty to try and replicate one of the ships in kerbal.

Game (Circled One)

Added pick for better comparison

Kerbal Edition

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Sorry if their bad comparison pics.

I'm VERY PLEASED with the results.

Download

http://www./view/j72wmfy4t54mbg0/Narwal.craft

Edit: BTW First replica craft i've attempted

CONTOLS

Space: Activate Main Engines

1: Toggle Back Engines

2: Toggle Down Engines

3: Toggle Up Engines

4: Toggle Front 2 Engines (use in extremely short bursts when nose pops up or you will spin out of control and die. shifting fuel can help prevent this)

Edited April 23, 2014 by Penguinhero

OOHH MAH GAWD

We MUST built the whole fleet!

Seriously, If you want help, the BWI hasn't had a good project in weeks, I'll help you build some more of those ships.

(And an egg carrier. It's not as cool as the egg whale but some would say more iconic)
I beat FAR is flippin' tables at it.

I beat FAR is flippin' tables at it.

the wings are too small for any lift and probably would affect it at all
